description: Situated astride Lake Ontario, Scarborough is a district heavily influenced by immigration. With a number of low-rent shopping and dining options making it a highly affordable part of town, and boasting one of Toronto's largest shopping malls, the otherwise green suburban neighborhood is a good place to go for bargains and discounts. It also draws in photographers. The spires, archways, and cavernous rooms of the BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir Palace are filled with breathtaking art, architecture, and detailed reliefs – it’s like entering a different world, The ruins of columns and installation art at the Guild Inn makes a free-for-all exploration site, while the big-name draw for young photographers is the menagerie at the Toronto Zoo. While many visitors shirk Scarborough as too suburban, its houses are some of Toronto's most mystical and haunting architectural beauties. And for adventure lovers, it has river-rafting and some unique hiking trails.

reviews.title: Limo bus is stinky school bus- not worth $1600 for 6 hours
text: Was supposed to be a limo bus. Was a converted school bus and we nearly got smoked out from the diesel smell the entire time

reviews.title: Poor Service and Communication
text: My husband booked the stretch limousine to take me and my girlfriend to the Toronto airport for a girls trip to Vegas. The limo arrived 45 minutes late to pick us up and I had to guide them over the phone for a half an hour on how to get to my house. I live on a major highway. I have been in contact with them regarding some type of compensation for this, but not receiving any response. When we were picked up at the airport, it was supposed to be a black limousine and they sent a white one. Not the biggest deal but still not what we ordered.  If I hear back from this company, I will update my review.

reviews.title: Easy ride to airport
text: On time and helpful with luggage and took fastest and direct root to airport, help unload and was very good helping my wife in and out of the limo.

reviews.title: NIGHTMARE
text: Beware of this limo service

We set up a limo ride to Niagara for my brothers 40th birthday. They Provided a limo driver who does not speak English, did not know how to use any basic functions in the car and how to use GPS. This nightmare started instantly taking back roads from the city to the highway. During the ride he got off the highway twice and started driving on city streets in circles, only until after our group guided him back to the highway did we start heading to the winery. Our group of ten with senior citizens were worried for our safety. We had stopped the party and spent the next hour and a half on edge to make sure he did not make anymore mistakes. We Helped guide him with our own phones to get us to the destination which we arrived 45 mins late. On the way back it started pouring rain and we were in panic because he did not know how to use the wipers going 100 km. I called customer service three times with no help, tried to get a hold of the management who did nothing. Spoke to the owner and he kept telling me “this is impossible, my drivers drives buses” did not care about our experience, we spent $1500 and he did not give us a penny back. Car also looks like nothing like the picture! straight out of the 80, rusty and beat up, but that’s not why we are very frustrated, unprofessional driver, put us in extreme danger and panic for 1 hour and 45 mins and company not taking any responsibility for this nightmare. DO NOT use this company.

reviews.title: horrible customer service and business practices
text: Horrible customer service. I was requesting to book a limo for my daughters b-day party and they communicated with me through text instead of calling and asked me to send them my credit card number via text. I told them I would like to come in and see the limo and pay then. The person responded with, "We only show the limo for weddings". I guess you have to spend over $1,000 to know what your are getting.
Based on the reviews, I can see why they wouldn't want anyone to see their limo's.

reviews.title: Stay away from this company
text: Limo is filthy poor customer service avoid at all cost.  My daughter and her friends were very disappointed when the limo arrived for prom

reviews.title: Promises without service and without pick up
text: Booked online, followed up with a phone call.
Needed early pick up. Confirmation advised to call driver or they would cancel which I did twice on the day before. Both times went to voice mail where voice mail was not set up.
On the morning of, I texted before pick up but no answer. Called several times to both driver and company but no answer just voice mail.

No pick up came. Didn’t get any service from this company. Emailed to cancel my return reservation as I can’t trust this company. Made alternate arrangements with a cab company who came promptly and got us to the airport as fast as they did. We ended up being an hour late to arrive at the airport and aren’t sure if we’ll make our flight.

reviews.title: Poor communication
text: The “deposit” amount will change drastically if you need to cancel.  If you risk using them do not pay in advance!!!!

reviews.title: DO NOT HIRE THIS COMPANY!
text: They are the cheapest for a reason. Their service is brutal and their vehicle and driver is disgusting.
Just don't hire them. Move on. Trust me.
We hired them for our wedding day. So bad in every aspect. I regret my decision.
Spend a couple hundred more with another company and save yourself the embarrassment.
Old hummer, smelly and dirty driver. No manners. No step stool to get up. Rude, ignorant, old and gross vehicle, unprofessional.
Move on. Please!

reviews.title: Terrible
text: I regret hiring them for my wedding..
1. There was little to no a/c and only one window was functional in a limo with 20 people, in 25 degree weather
2. The exit door does not close properly. We struggled to close it and it was extremely concerning
3. We paid for champagne, however there were no champagne glasses...
4. We had trouble with the aux and when our limo driver tried calling for help, my bridal party of 20 witnessed her being yelled at, rather then helped

5. Tony was extremely rude and disrespectful. He said I was wasting his time when he could be calling a taxi, while I was trying to explain our situation to him. He raised his voice at us which was the most unprofessional thing and rather for taking responsibility, he argued it’s not his fault, though it’s his company. The limo didn’t even have booster cables, which is odd for a company not to have
6. The limo battery died, which made us late
7. There was also no “Just Married”  sign
8. No red carpet !

reviews.title: Do not
text: So this review does not relate to myself however I was going to use this service pending my friends experience
Well, the ride going to the airport didn’t arrive
They waited 45 minutes & drove themselves
The company finally called them but at this point they had left Hamilton, drove 45 minutes to the airport, parked, got through security. If they had waited the probably would have missed the flight

reviews.title: Almost hired but read the reviews after speaking to Ion or Jon...hard to tell
text: He/she will nickel and dime you and then become abusive if you decide not to use his service. He called me a junkie...lol OMG. I then read the reviews and now I am so glad I never used this limo service. There are so many to chose from pick another one. He will reply to this review but in the end all you have to do is read the other reviews to know this isn't a good company to use.

reviews.title: Terrible service!
text: I hired this limo company to provide a stretch limo to transport my wedding party to and from my wedding venue.  The car arrived on time however was in terrible condition rusted & dented.  The doors would not open from the inside, the a/c barely cooled the interior, the driver was obviously unfamiliar with the vehicle and on the return trip it leaked in the rain dripping on my guests.  The driver was terrible driving in traffic alternately stomping on the gas then slamming on the brakes sending us jolting back & forth and practically landing on one another.  I made the mistake of tipping the driver at the beginning of our trip and had the nerve to complain about having to wait when he arrived 45 minutes early of our pick up time at the end of the evening.  DO NOT HIRE THIS COMPANY!!!!

reviews.title: HORRIBLE service and old run down limos
text: I used this limo service today and was very disappointed in both the quality of the vehicle provided and the driver's attitude. I paid a great deal of money for the service and nothing except the radio worked in the vehicle. Not the lights, tv nor the windows. In addition, there was NO storage or trunk for luggage etc. When I asked the driver for assistance she knew nothing and had no idea how to work anything and just told me to "figure it out". When I called the main office to complain the person there was extremely rude and unpleasant and didn't care at all about my concerns. I guess once they get your money they no longer are concerned about customer service, word of mouth or return business. I will NEVER use this company again and I recommend you look elsewhere for a limo.

reviews.title: WORST EXPERIENCE EVER
text: I hired this limo company to provide transport for my daughters wedding party to and from the venue. The car arrived on time but was in terrible condition, the limo was dirty, the running board was broke, the air conditioning did not work, the bride was in tears by the time she got to the venue the driver was a terrible driver and the whole ride was jerky,  the bride and bridesmaids all had grease on their dresses, passenger window up front was broken and there were no wine glasses for champagne.  I sent the company 5 or more emails demanding a refund for the gratuity that was paid twice by mistake and they never replied to me. DO NOT EVER HIRE THIS COMPANY!!!

reviews.title: WORST EXPERIENCE!!!
text: My best friends wedding this limo shows up late (25 mins - no call for an update), therefore groom/groomsmen took an Uber, leaving the limo for bride/bridesmaids. Once arrived, driver sat in the front seat on his cellphone. Didn’t acknowledge us, didn’t even open to door for the bride and her party. DISGUSTING. We pile inside when the driver tells us we won’t be moving until the bill is “settled”. This had already been taken care of PRIOR to her wedding day! Driver continues to try to get more money, while us, the bridal party scream at him to move the limo - had 15 mins to get to venue at this point! He FINALLY starts moving and then we realize the inside of this vehicle. Picture this.. no AC, duct tape on the passenger door, warm bottle of champagne, stains from previous spills, and our seat was completely broken! We arrive at venue - we think the worst is over - nope!

So now it’s 1:00 am and the driver is suppose to now take the entire bridal party back to hotel... he proceeds to ask the groom for cash in order to refund the money paid for on the credit card and will not drive us until he gets the money. Long story short the owner (who proceeded to scream at the party over the phone) was not getting more money. We then contacted our AMAZING hotel manager in a panic who then helped us set up with 2 Uber’s and got all 12 of us back safe!
WOULD NEVER EVER RECOMMEND!
Sincerely the Maid of Honor!

reviews.title: Toronto Limos.comToronto, ONTel: (416) 488-3888 Fax: (416) 352-7419Email: info@torontolimos.com755720695RC0001
text: Beware  DON’T be fooled by these people, I order 2 two for my wedding and it was the worst thing ever. Both limo showed up dirty and looked over use and abuse. That’s not all, while riding in the limo it felt the wheels was falling off not sure how these limo are safe to carry people and still on the road. I called the office to speak with the manger about the service and he was rude and told me to F-off.

reviews.title: Horrible Customer and NO A/C in two limos!
text: Horrible experience on my wedding day! First off the drivers asked for their tip upfront, which was a bit odd and rude but we provided him with his tip as we would have done either way. We had ordered two SUV limos for our wedding day, the groomsman entered their limo first and noticed the air conditioning was not working, which was extremely frustrating as it was a hot day to begin with and they are all wearing suits. Then the driver advised them that the second limo driver didn't know where to go so he was going to wait for her...which was not the plan. The guys had to leave first, he made them wait an extra 15mins, and now we are behind scheduled.

I entered our limo, and noticed immediately how hot the limo was. She had the car waiting, but did not turn on the A/C either. We asked her to turn it on and she said it is on. HEAT was blasting from the vents, blasting. The driver did not care at all about our current condition and she that's all she could do. We then asked if the radio could be turn on, and that didn't work. She then proceeding to tell us that she didn't know where to go, and we had to use our own GPS to guide her the way. I am approx 30mins from my wedding, in a heated vehicle, with a sick mother, directing the driver where to go. I was not celebrating my soon to be wedding as I should have been, this drive should have been easy, fun and cool. The driver then proceeded to make a wrong turn, which then made me 15mins late for my own wedding. This was literally the most stressful part of the day, when it should have been the easiest. The driver did not have a care in the world that we were running late, dying of heat or that the radio did not work. You would think the limos would have to have specific checks before leaving the property??

This experience was absolutely horrible. I sent the company five emails explaining the day and requested a refund. Did not receive an email back. Finally called them, they said they never received any of my emails. They offered me a $200 credit... I paid $1,400 for a service that was not provided. I did not want a credit, I would never use them again! I said no I want my money back, the gentleman on the phone told me he would have to pay for the A/C to be fixed... not my problem... then told me I wouldn't get a penny back and then advised me to never call them again. Wow.

reviews.title: DISGUSTING COMPANY
text: This has to be the absolute WORST limo service and customer experience I have EVER HAD!!!
Rented a H2 hummer limo for my sons 12th birthday. What I got was a bus and a rude driver who arrived with a untucked shirt and unzipped pants.
I confronted the driver saying “this was not what I had reserved” his response was rude and arrogant.
The bus was rusted also.
The return vehicle was a completely different one(another old and rusted vehicle).
The driver called me for directions and when I told him he was supposed to know, he told me to “f- off” and hung up.
My son and his friends told me their ride was extremely hot (no AC). They didn’t let them turn down the windows and the limo was filthy.
I was also charged 1000 for this. Please. I have no idea how this limo company is still in existence. They are a SCAM!!!

reviews.title: No AC
text: We hired Toronto Limos to go to the Rolling Stones.  The AC was blowing only hot air and it was hot outside.  We called company prior to leaving and were told that we had to pay in advance and get adjustment through office on Tues since it was a holiday weekend.  Sounded simple enough.  Everything else was great.  Driver was great and on time.  Really nice guy.  We were told on Tuesday that the air was working before it left to get us.  Well it didn't work at all when we got it.  The driver acknowledged that and even sent a message to the company.  We sent emailed and texts ahead of time.   We even got written acknowledgement from the driver.   We asked for 10 percent  adjustment in compensation  and they took the stand that it was working before it left.  It's not on their contract that it includes AC so if you hire them insist that it is worded in so you can seek compensation on "not as described service"  with your credit card company if you get one without working air.  The driver was so awesome I would have gladly used this company again but the company is terrible so I will never use them again.  There are plenty of others out there.

reviews.title: STAY FAR AWAY
text: Stay FAR away from this company. My best friend got married on May 25, 2019. She had to take off her wedding dress, clean it and wear it wet due to the limo being filthy. The a.c., radio, lighting and sound didn't work-perhaps due to the water leaking through the roof.
Confirmation emails came from info@torontolimos.com however the hyperlink included was for limos.com (likely intentional).
The final payment was charged by Prestige Limousine Servi (353 Lawford Road Woodbridge). The phone number associated to them is (416) 488-3888 and they seem to be changing their business name often.
The company did not respond to my follow up email on May 26, 2019 in regards to my concerns and hung up on my phone call on June 3rd.
PLEASE prevent a TERRIBLE experience and stay FAR away.

reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
text: BUYER BEWARE - DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY. All reviews are absolutely correct. They are also trying to change their company name to Prestige Limousine Services to get away from all of these poor reviews. THIS COMPANY SCAMS!! We booked them both for our shower and wedding day. The day of our shower, their driver would not move unless we paid, which full payment was completed ahead of time by my husband. Completely embarrassing! Then they double charged the TIP and would not reimburse. The drive to Niagara from Toronto was the roughest trip, we couldn't even drink our champaign between the aggressive lane shifts, and breaks. I had even screenshotted our speed of over 120 on the highway through waze. For the wedding day, thank god for our wedding planner noticing the discrepancy in their plan a couple of days prior as they were only going to drop us off at the church and not pick us up. This is how they scam their clients as you will be stuck paying the premium(which was 3x the contracted amount)!!! And they would not reimburse, we had to take legal action through Amex to get our money back. As we scrambled last minute and found another company (which I highly recommend) -
TORONTO LIMO RENTALS
O/A Hummer Limo Service Inc.
1093 Lorimar Drive, Unit 2
Mississauga, L5S 1M5
info@torontolimorentals.com

reviews.title: Unbelievably memorable for the wrong reasons
text: I honestly can’t believe the service this company offers. First off, our driver showed up over an hour late when he was to pick up at 530pm. Once we got into the limo, it was clear he car hadn’t even been cleared of debris from the last clients with beer and Soda cans still left behind. We understand stuff happens and traffic can cause issues, but he hardly seemed bothered, after repeated calls asking if he was on his way.

His routes to and from places were not direct and seemed like he was lost or didn’t know where he was going at times. Further, his driving was most erratic. Driving incredibly fast and then to slam on the breaks. It seemed like he was doing this intentionally?

We have had many limo and car services before and this one was honestly, terrible. He even had the audacity to stand outside, seeming to look for a tip. $400 car limo ride- should have take 2 Uber’s and it would have got us on time and been WAY less expensive at at least half the price.
Won’t use your service again.

reviews.title: Horrible experience
text: So I have used this particular company for three years. The previous two years – we had an awesome trip. Great driver, very punctual, and very knowledgable about driving and about where he was going. Last night was a disaster. Driver was an hour late, had no clue how to operate any of the systems like the air-conditioning, defrost, music or heating,and I actually was wondering if he knew how to drive the vehicle.  One of my fellow passengers joked that we would not have to do crunches in our workout because our core was engaged to maintain our balance for the whole drive.
If I could get it give it zero stars I would - do not hire this company😩
